data.text: @MarionKoopmans Very usefull information. Closed environments like schools, public transport especially longer travel, bars and events in smaller not well ventilated areas would probably show similar contamination and risk of transmission. To be taken into account with containment strategies
@MarionKoopmans Dispositive proof that the origins of sars-cov2 is from these nursing homes https://t.co/Vw4RkIgnbA
@Frank_Luttels @MarionKoopmans That's old science! 🙂 (Based on real data.)

@MarionKoopmans Nice study. Wished our government and OMT had not waited for such studies to act responsible in care homes: proper masks and ventilation. That would have saved more lives.
Not knowing for sure does not mean that one should wait and see.

@MarionKoopmans When you would have put the elderly outside in the garden everyday for several hours, fresh air, Vitamin D for free, that would have been a plan in stead of locking them up.
Or still proud of the way you and fellow scientists reacted the first summer of the Covid pandemic?
